name: DFK
description: Defi Kingdoms is a play-to-earn fantasy RPG built on Avalanche, blending decentralized finance (DeFi) with blockchain gaming. Players can trade, stake, and battle while earning rewards through its in-game economy and liquidity pools.

chains.name: DFK Chain
chains.description: The vision for the DFK Avalanche L1 is to become the go-to location for community members and projects to launch GameFi and other blockchain gaming experiences in conjunction with the primary offering of DeFi Kingdoms: Crystalvale.
